body_html:
Hi, I revise code and explain the invalid cases as below:

  • x = {}, raise a ValueError
  • y = {}, raise a ValueError, and suggest user to use None instead.
  • y = None, leave a todo comment, but don't change the behavior now for compatibility.

By the way, more tests have been added to cover those cases above.
body_text:
Hi, I revise code and explain the invalid cases as below:

x = {}, raise a ValueError
y = {}, raise a ValueError, and suggest user to use None instead.
y = None, leave a todo comment, but don't change the behavior now for compatibility.

By the way, more tests have been added to cover those cases above.
body:
Hi, I revise code and explain the invalid cases as below:

+ `x = {}`, raise a ValueError
+ `y = {}`, raise a ValueError, and suggest user to use `None` instead.
+ `y = None`, leave a todo comment, but don't change the behavior now for compatibility.

By the way, more tests have been added to cover those cases above.
